title: vara vENum
sahitya:
varavENum vANi en nAvil vandu amaravENum kAN nI maNi vINAdhAriNi



anupallavi



vara vElAyudapANi padam pENipparavum tamizh taravE nityakalyANi



caraNam



anaiyE nI aghamadil kANi koNDurai kanda gAnAmudam tarum kENi ena unaiyE
ninai enaiyAL nI ayan uLamagizh rANi un aruL kaviyAm kunjaradAsanAm enkEL nI
